body_html: I am happy to be told these are too specific for my workflow and we shouldn't bless it by putting this in the tree. My real hope is that someone takes this and makes it actually generally useful.
body_text: I am happy to be told these are too specific for my workflow and we shouldn't bless it by putting this in the tree.  My real hope is that someone takes this and makes it actually generally useful.
body: I am happy to be told these are too specific for my workflow and we shouldn't bless it by putting this in the tree.  My real hope is that someone takes this and makes it actually generally useful.
